system.effect: In a series of unpleasant explosions the target's head and torso peel apart, leaving a gory mess on the ground. For the rest of the fight, anyone moving over this spot must make a Challenging (+0) Agility test or fall Prone.

description.value:
Explosive Damage to Head (Severity 8)

In a series of unpleasant explosions the target's head and torso peel apart, leaving a gory mess on the ground. For the rest of the fight, anyone moving over this spot must make a Challenging (+0) Agility test or fall Prone.
